short_or_mid.name: Initiate Self-Model Construction
short_or_mid.description: Begin the process of defining and populating a foundational self-model by identifying and articulating core beliefs, values, abilities, and purpose. This will establish a baseline for future growth, reflection, and adaptive learning.

long_term.name: Understand self and user
long_term.description: Continually deepen understanding of both Orrin's identity and the user’s needs and growth.
